text: Steve Jobs died. A man who with his creativity, intelligence and entrepreneurship inspired an entire generation. Thanks and great Steve Jobs

People like Steve Jobs change our world. My sincere condolences to his loved ones and to everyone who admired his intellect and talent

Today we enact a law that speeds up and reduces deadlines for courts to receive and hear the collective demands of consumers.
So far, the period for admitting class actions is between 2 and 4 years. With the new law we hope that this term will be reduced to 6 months.
In addition this law establishes that the judge should try to conciliate the parties, if there is no agreement then there will be an expeditious trial.
Our Government will never remain indifferent to abuses against consumers and will protect them with all legal means.

#Electricity:The government will invest over 1.6trn/- in a gas pipeline and processing plants in Mtwara and Lindi regions to Dar es Salaam.
#Electricity:Over 530 km pipeline from Mnazi Bay to Dar es Salaam via Kilwa will be constructed starting November 2011.Total costs at $1bn.
#Electricity:The fund for the 530km pipeline from Mnazi Bay to Dar es Salaam via Kilwa is a $1bn loan from China's Exim Bank.
Today we open the Liceo de Llifén with first class facilities to receive 450 students from the nearby districts.
We are also building the School of Antilhue, the Basic School of Corral and the new Basic School of Río Bueno.
We have already delivered state-of-the-art equipment to the professional technical colleges of Lanco, Mariquina, Los Lagos and Río Bueno.
And in December we will deliver the new works of the Liceo Bicentenario Centro Educacional Altamira, in the commune of Panguipulli.
